tool_description: Create an account, fund an account, manage a catalog, send rewards and get reporting — all available on demand, in real time and as a service. With our RaaS® API, you can elegantly knit a sophisticated rewards program into your platform. Best of all, the service has zero fees.
name: Rewards as a Service
title: Rewards as a Service

api_list.name: 4. Get list of rewards
api_list.description: Gets the list of rewards available for the platform
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/rewards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/rewards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the list of rewards available on the platform?
What rewards can I access through the service right now?
Please provide the current rewards catalog.
I'd like to see the available rewards options.
What are the rewards I can choose from?
Show me the rewards list offered by the platform.
Could you list all the rewards available?
I want to know what rewards are currently available.
Get me the list of all available rewards.
What rewards does the platform offer at the moment?

api_list.name: 2. Get Account Information
api_list.description: Get the information for an account created under a Customer

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the account details for customer ID 12345 with account identifier ABCD1234?
I need to check the account information for customer 67890 using the account identifier XYZ9876.
Please fetch the account details for customer number 54321 with the account ID LMN4567.
Retrieve the account information for customer 11223 and account identifier QRS7890.
Get the account details for customer ID 33445 with account identifier TUV1234.
Can you show me the account information for customer 55667 using account ID WXY5678?
I need the account details for customer 77889 with the account identifier ZAB9012.
Please provide the account information for customer 99001 and account ID CDE3456.
Fetch the account details for customer 22334 with account identifier FGH6789.
Retrieve the account information for customer 44556 using the account ID IJK0123.

api_list.name: 6. Get order information
api_list.description: Get more information about an order

utterances.utterance: Can you provide details for the order with ID 12345?
I need more information about the order with ID ABCD1234.
What are the details of the order with ID 98765?
Please fetch the order information for ID ORDER2023.
Can you look up the order with ID 54321 and give me the details?
I would like to know more about the order with ID XYZ7890.
Get the information for the order with ID 112233.
Could you provide the details for order ID 445566?
Retrieve the order information for ID 778899.
What information is available for the order with ID ABC123?

api_list.name: 7. Get order history
api_list.description: Get more information about all the orders placed on this customer and account

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the order history for customer ID 12345 on account ABCD123?
Show me the recent orders for customer 67890 on account XYZ789, starting from January 1, 2023.
I need the order history for customer 54321 on account LMN456 with a limit of 10 records.
Retrieve all orders for customer 98765 on account QRS321 from March 1, 2023, to March 31, 2023.
Get the order history for customer 11223 on account TUV654 with an offset of 5.
Please provide the order details for customer 33445 on account WXY987, limited to 20 entries.
Fetch the order history for customer 55667 on account ZAB123, starting from February 15, 2023.
Can you show me the orders for customer 77889 on account CDE456 from April 1, 2023, to April 15, 2023?
I want to see the order history for customer 99001 on account FGH789 with an offset of 10 and a limit of 5.
Provide the order history for customer 22334 on account IJK012, starting from May 1, 2023.

api_list.name: 5. Place an order for a reward
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/orders"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
